rows.label: tlk70000007_05_msg0001
rows.name:
Hi, everyone! Great to see
you again! Thank you so
much for the medicine.

rows.label: tlk70000007_05_msg0002
rows.name:
I can walk and run around now,
and I don't even get any chest
pains. It's the best feeling!

rows.label: tlk70000007_05_msg0003
rows.name:
I promised Joey and Marco that I'd
go exploring with them in the city
just as soon as it's safe.

rows.label: tlk70000007_05_msg0004
rows.name:
I haven't really been much further
than my house, because I was sick.
So I can't wait to see more of Iira!

rows.label: tlk70000007_05_msg0005
rows.name:
You all gave me hope. I bet
you're just the people to give
some hope to the whole of Iira.

rows.label: tlk70000007_05_msg0006
rows.name:
Promise you'll win
through! Pretty please?
